On Wed, 2004-11-17 at 02:57, ozimmels wrote:
> ok - took in all that i was advised to do.
> and so here is what i did (and still it didn't work)
> 
> crawled the following site i created :
> 
> http://related.siftology.com/ori/single/
> 
> the site has only one page to simplify things.
> 
> ok - got an arc file IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc
> 
> having a cdx.sh script to extract cdx files i did
> 
> > ./cdx.sh IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc > test.cdx
> Note: 
> also tried:                   
> > ./cdx.sh IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc | sort > test.cdx
> 
> cdx extract output :
> ****************************************************
> filedesc://IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc 0.0.0.0 20041116233819
> text/plain 1174 IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc 0
> dns:related.siftology.com 63.203.35.55 20041116233819 text/dns 63
> IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc 1257
> http://related.siftology.com/robots.txt 66.167.120.196 20041116233820
> text/html 1332 IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc 1388
> http://related.siftology.com/ori/single/ 66.167.120.196 20041116233821
> text/html 393 IAH-20041116233819-00000-zen.arc 2806
> ***********************************************************

I assume you're giving proxyviewer the sorted version, otherwise it
won't be able to find anything.

> i put the cdx file and the arch file in the same dir:
> 
> and i ran the proxy viewer
[...looks good...]

> then in firefox i did :
> 
> http://zen:8081/
>
> and on the console i got : 
> Note : i added some printouts to the code
> in: 
> **************************************************
[icon stuff]
> Nov 16, 2004 4:31:59 PM dk.netarkivet.proxyviewer.ARCArchiveAccess lookup
> INFO: ** Looking up key /
> Nov 16, 2004 4:31:59 PM dk.netarkivet.proxyviewer.ARCArchiveAccess
> getCDXEntry
> WARNING: Failed to get CDX entry for /
> Nov 16, 2004 4:31:59 PM dk.netarkivet.proxyviewer.ARCArchiveAccess lookup
> INFO: Checking for / failed
[more icon stuff]
> ***************************************************************
> 
> firefox showes : 
> **************************
> Can't find URL: /
> **************************
> 
> any ideas ? 

I take it zen is the machine you're running it on.  You want to set
firefox to use the http proxy zen port 8081, and then go to the original
URL, i.e. http://related.siftology.com/ori/single/.

-Lars
